name: Last Light
entries: A burst of brilliant light ushers from you, each creature of your choice in a 20ft radius must make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of their next turn. You shed bright light in a 20ft radius. At the start of you next turn the light vanishes and a burst of necrotic energy dealing {@dice 2d8} necrotic damage to each creature that was blinded by this spell and still within range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the range increases by 5 feet and the necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level past 1st.
